      • downloadBitmap

        public static Bitmap downloadBitmap(java.lang.String imageUrl)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Download the bitmap from server
        Parameters:
        imageUrl - The user of bitmap
        Returns:
        The downloaded bitmap
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When we could not download the image

      • fixBitmapSize

        public static Bitmap fixBitmapSize(Bitmap bitmap,
                                   int maxWidth)
        Scale the bitmap in need to make sure the the width of bitmap will not bigger than a specific width
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap need to scale
        maxWidth - The maximum bitmap's width
        Returns:
        If the bitmap is need to scale, return the scaled bitmap, otherwise, return the original bitmap
